member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by PivotDataSelector (igPivotDataSelector widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DataSelectorRendered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data selector is rendered. Changing the data source instance will re-render the data selector.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DataSourceInitialized
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has initialized.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during initialization.
Use ui.metadataTreeRoot to get a reference to the root of the data source metatadata root item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DataSourceUpdated
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has updated.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during update.
Use ui.result to get the result of the update operation.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DeferUpdateChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised when the defer update checkbox changes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.
Use ui.deferUpdate to get the defer update value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DragStart
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag start.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.Drag
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DragStop
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag stop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataDropping
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataDropped
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataRemoving
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the dragged element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataRemoved
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpening
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the filter members drop down opens.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpened
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members drop down opens.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterMembersLoaded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members are loaded.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.rootFilterMembers for a collection with the root filter members.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownOk
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the OK button in the filter members drop down is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.filterMembers for a collection with the selected filter members. If all filter members are selected the collection will be empty.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.filterDropDownClosing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the filter members drop down closes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownClosed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members drop down closes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by PivotGrid (igPivotGrid widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DataSourceInitialized
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has initialized.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during initialization.
Use ui.metadataTreeRoot to get a reference to the root of the data source metatadata root item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DataSourceUpdated
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has updated.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during update.
Use ui.result to get the result of the update operation.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.PivotGridHeadersRendered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the headers have been rendered.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.grid to get a reference to the igGrid widget, which holds the headers.
Use ui.table to get a reference to the headers table DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.PivotGridRendered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the whole grid widget has been rendered (including headers, footers, etc.).
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.grid to get a reference to the igGrid widget, which holds the headers.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberExpanding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the expand of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberExpanded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the expand of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberCollapsing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the collapse of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberCollapsed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the collapse of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.Sorting
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the sorting of the columns.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.sortDirections to get an array of the tuple indices and sort directions that will be used.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.Sorted
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the sorting of the columns.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.sortDirections to get an array of the tuple indices and sort directions that were passed to the table view.
Use ui.appliedSortDirections to get an array of the tuple indices and sort directions that were actually applied to the table view.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.HeadersSorting
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the sorting of the headers.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.levelSortDirections to get an array of the level names and sort directions that will be used.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.HeadersSorted
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the sorting of the headers.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.levelSortDirections to get an array of the level names and sort directions that were used.
Use ui.appliedLevelSortDirections to get an array of the level names and sort directions that were actually applied to the table view.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DragStart
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag start.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.Drag
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag.

Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.

member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag stop.

Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataDropping
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataDropped
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataRemoving
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the dragged element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataRemoved
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpening

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpened

member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members are loaded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownOk
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the OK button in the filter members drop down is clicked.

Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Popover (igPopover widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Showing
member.summary: Event fired before a popover is shown. Return false in order to cancel action. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover will show for. Use ui.content to get or set the content to be shown as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element showing. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Shown
member.summary: Event fired after popover is shown. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover showed for. Use ui.content to get or set the content was shown as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element shown. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Hiding
member.summary: Event fired before a popover is hidden. Return false in order to cancel action. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover will hide for. Use ui.content to get the current content displayed in the popover as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element hiding. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Hidden
member.summary: Event fired after popover is hidden. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover hid for. Use ui.content to get the current content displayed in the popover as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element hidden. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuChildItemPlacement
member.summary: Enumeration used to define where the child items of a radial menu item are positioned relative to the parent.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuChildItemPlacement.AsChildren
member.summary: The Items are displayed within a separate level that is accessed by clicking on the button in the outer ring of the radial menu for the parent.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuChildItemPlacement.AsSiblingsWhenChecked
member.summary: The items are displayed as siblings of the parent as long as the IsChecked of the item is set to true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuChildItemPlacement.None
member.summary: The child items are not displayed.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuCheckBehavior
member.summary: Enumeration used to define whether how the item's IsChecked state may be changed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuCheckBehavior.None
member.summary: The item is not checkable

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuCheckBehavior.CheckBox
member.summary: The item is checkable and may be independantly checked or unchecked without affecting other items.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuCheckBehavior.RadioButton
member.summary: The item is checkable. Only 1 item from the items with the same GroupName may be checked at a time and the checked item may not be unchecked.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialMenuCheckBehavior.RadioButtonAllowAllUp
member.summary: The item is checkable. Only 1 item from the items with the same GroupName may be checked at a time and the checked item may not be checked allowing all items to be unchecked.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Rating (igRating widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingClientEvents.HoverChange
member.summary:
Event which is raised before hover value is changed.
If application returns false, then action is canceled and hover value stays unchanged.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to get new value.
Use ui.oldValue to get old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingClientEvents.ValueChange
member.summary:
Event which is raised before (selected) value is changed.
If application returns false, then action is canceled and value stays unchanged.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to get new value.
Use ui.oldValue to get old value.

member.summary: Exact value is used

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingPrecision.Half
member.summary: Half of vote value is used

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingPrecision.Whole
member.summary: Whole vote value is used

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel
member.summary: Class describing options available for the Rating.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.#ctor
member.summary: Create RatingModel

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the rating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.InputName
member.summary: Sets the name of the hidden input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

remarks.p: Dictionary of attributes passed to TagBuilder.MergeAttributes(value).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Value
member.summary: Sets value for control.

remarks.p: Value in range from 0 to 1. Default value in the widget is 0.
Note: If Value is set, then new value will have priority over value modified on client. Client value will not persist between postbacks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteCount
member.summary: Sets number of vote items.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is 5.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Vertical
member.summary: Sets vertical orientation of control.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false and control has horizontal orientation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Precision
member.summary: Sets precision.

remarks.p: Exact, half or whole. Default value in the widget is Exact.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets disabled state of control.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.SwapDirection
member.summary: Sets swaped direction from left to right or from top to bottom in case of vertical orientation.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Focusable
member.summary: Sets option to enable control getting focus.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteItemWidth
member.summary: Sets width of vote item in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is not set and width is defined by css classes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteItemHeight
member.summary: Sets height of vote item in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is not set and height is defined by css classes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ValueAsPercent
member.summary: Sets option to use percentage units or vote-number units for the Value and HoverValue.

remarks.p: True: the percent (from 0 to 1) is used for value. False: the value is measured in number of votes. Default value in the widget is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.RoundedDecimalPlaces
member.summary: Sets number of decimal places used to round value.

remarks.p: To disable rounding that property should be set to -1. Default value in the widget is 3.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for control. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.PrecisionZeroVote
member.summary: Sets part of vote-size, which is considered as zero value.

remarks.p: It has effect only when precision is set to "half" or "whole". If user clicks between edge of the first vote and (sizeOfVote * precisionZeroVote), then value is set to 0. Same is applied for mouseover as well. Default is 0.25.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.CssVotes
member.summary: Sets model for custom css classes for vote-item at particular index.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validator options. Note: this option will have effect only when application registers ig.ui.validator.js and ig.ui.validator.css.

member.summary: Client events exposed by the Scheduler (igScheduler widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AgendaRangeChanged
member.summary: Event which is fired after agenda view range is changed when using previous and next buttons (fired only in Agenda View). Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.dateRangeInterval to obtain a reference to the days to be shown in AgendaView mode. Use ui.newAgendaRangeStartDate to obtain a reference to the newly AgendaView start date.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AgendaRangeChanging
member.summary: Event which is fired before agenda view range is changed when using previous and next buttons (fired only in Agenda View). Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.dateRangeInterval to obtain a reference to the days to be shown in AgendaView mode. Use ui.currentAgendaRangeStartDate to obtain a reference to the current AgendaView start date. Use ui.newAgendaRangeStartDate to obtain a reference to the newly AgendaView start date.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentCreated
member.summary: Event which is fired after an appointment is created. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.appointment to obtain a reference to the created appointment.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentCreating
member.summary: Event which is fired before an appointment is created. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.appointment to obtain a reference to the appointment which is going to be created.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentDeleted
member.summary: Event which is fired after an appointment is deleted. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.appointmentId to get the id of the deleted appointment.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentDeleting
member.summary: Event which is fired before an appointment is deleted. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.appointment to obtain a reference to the appointment which is going to be deleted.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentDialogClosed
member.summary: Event which is fired after closing the dialog window for adding/editing an appointment. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.element to obtain reference to the appointment dialog. Use ui.isAppointmentNew to get whether the appointment is created/updated.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentDialogClosing
member.summary: Event which is fired after before clsoing the dialog window for adding/editing an appointment. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.element to obtain reference to the appointment dialog. Use ui.isAppointmentNew to get whether the appointment is creating/updating.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentDialogOpened
member.summary: Event which is fired after opening the dialog for creating/editing appointment. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.element to obtain reference to the appointment dialog. Use ui.isAppointmentNew to get whether we are creating or updating an appointment.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentDialogOpening
member.summary: Event which is fired before opening the dialog for creating/editing appointment. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the scheduler. Use ui.element to obtain reference to the appointment dialog. Use ui.isAppointmentNew to get whether we are creating or updating an appointment.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentEdited
member.summary: Event which is fired after an appointment is edited. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.appointment to obtain a reference to the edited appointment.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.AppointmentEditing
member.summary: Event which is fired before an appointment is edited. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.appointment to obtain a reference to the original appointment. Use ui.newAppointment to obtain a reference to the appointment with the edited values.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.DaySelected
member.summary: Event which is fired when a day is selected from the datepicker calendar. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.date to obtain a reference to the currently selected date.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.MonthChanged
member.summary: Event which is fired after month is changed when using previous and next buttons (fired only in Month View). Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.newSelectedDate to obtain a reference to the newly selected date.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.MonthChanging
member.summary: Event which is fired before changing the month begins, when using previous and next buttons (fired only in Month View). Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.newSelectedDate to obtain a reference to the newly selected date. Use ui.currentSelectedDate to obtain a reference to the currently selected date.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.Rendered
member.summary: Event which is fired after rendering of the scheduler has finished. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler that performed the rendering.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.Rendering
member.summary: Event which is fired before rendering of the scheduler begins. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler performing the rendering.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.ViewChanged
member.summary: Event which is fired after the view is changed, when using the menu buttons. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.newSelectedView to obtain a reference to the newly selected view.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SchedulerClientEvents.ViewChanging
member.summary: Event which is fired before the view is changed, when using the menu buttons. Function takes evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain a reference to the scheduler. Use ui.currentSelectedView to obtain a reference to the currently selected view. Use ui.newSelectedView to obtain a reference to the newly selected view.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Sparkline (igSparkline widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before data binding.
Return false in order to cancel data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary:
Event which is raised after data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.data to obtain reference to array actual data which is displayed by chart.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.UpdateTooltip
member.summary:
Event which is raised before tooltip is updated.
Return false in order to cancel updating and hide tooltip.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.text to obtain html of tooltip. Value of that member can be modified. If modified value is null or empty string, then current content of tooltip keeps old value.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to item. Value of that member can be modified or replaced by custom item.
Use ui.x to obtain left position of tooltip in pixels relative to widget. Value of that member can be modified.
Use ui.y to obtain top position of tooltip in pixels relative to widget. Value of that member can be modified.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery object which represents tooltip. Value of that member can be replaced by custom element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.HideTooltip
member.summary:
Event which is raised before tooltip is hidden.
Return false in order to cancel hiding and keep tooltip visible.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to item.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery object which represents tooltip or value of ui.element from last updateTooltip event. Value of that member can be replaced by custom element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineModel.FormatLabel
member.summary:
Sets or gets a function which takes an object that produces a formatted label for displaying in the chart.
Function should return string and it takes 1 parameter: original value of label.
Example:
"function(val) { return typeof val === 'number' && val < 0 ? '(' + (-val) + ')' : val; }"

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SplitterClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Splitter (igSplitter widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SplitterClientEvents.Collapsed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after splitter panel is collapsed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSplitter.
Use ui.index to obtain the index of collapsed panel.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SplitterClientEvents.Expanded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after splitter panel is expanded.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSplitter.
Use ui.index to obtain the index of expanded panel.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SplitterClientEvents.ResizeStarted
member.summary:
Event which is raised before splitter bar is moved.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSplitter.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SplitterClientEvents.Resizing
member.summary:
Event which is raised while splitter bar is moving.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSplitter.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SplitterClientEvents.ResizeEnded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after splitter bar is moved.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSplitter.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Spreadsheet (igSpreadsheet widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.ActionExecuted
member.summary: Event which is raised when an action is executed on the Spreadsheet. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.action to obtain the action that was executed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.ActionExecuting
member.summary: Event which is raised when an action is about to be executed by the Spreadsheet. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.action to obtain the action that is about to be executed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.ActiveCellChanged
member.summary: Event which is raised when the activeCell of the Spreadsheet has changed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.oldValue to obtain the previous active cell. Use ui.newValue to obtain the current active cell.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.ActivePaneChanged
member.summary: Event which is raised when the activePane of the Spreadsheet has changed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.oldActivePane to obtain the previous active pane. Use ui.newActivePane to obtain the current active pane. Use ui.activeCell to obtain the active cell of the new active pane or null if there is no active pane. Use ui.visibleRange to obtain the current visible range of the new active pane or null if there is no active pane.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.ActiveWorksheetChanged
member.summary: Event which is raised when the activeWorksheet of the Spreadsheet has changed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.oldActiveWorksheet to obtain the previous active worksheet. Use ui.oldActiveWorksheetName to obtain the name of the previous active worksheet or null if oldActiveWorksheet is null. Use ui.newActiveWorksheet to obtain the current active worksheet. Use ui.newActiveWorksheetName to obtain the name of the new active worksheet or null if newActiveWorksheet is null.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.EditModeExiting
member.summary: Event which is raised when the Spreadsheet is about to end the in-place editing of the activeCell. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.acceptChanges to obtain or set a boolean indicating whether the changes will be made to the cell's value when edit mode ends. Use ui.canCancel to obtain a boolean indicating if the edit mode is being forced to exit edit mode in which case it cannot be cancelled. Use ui.cell to obtain the cell for which the control is exiting edit mode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.EditModeExited
member.summary: Event which is raised when the Spreadsheet has ended the in-place editing of the activeCell. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.cell to obtain the cell for which the control has exited edit mode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.EditModeEntering
member.summary: Event which is raised when the Spreadsheet is about to start in-place editing of the activeCell. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.cell to obtain the cell for which the control is going into edit mode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.EditModeEntered
member.summary: Event which is raised when the Spreadsheet has started in-place editing of the activeCell. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.cell to obtain the cell for which the control has entered edit mode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.EditModeValidationError
member.summary: Event which is raised when the Spreadsheet is exiting edit mode and the new value for the activeCell is not valid based on the criteria of that cell's ig.excel.DataValidationRule. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.action to obtain or set the action to take in response to the failed validation. Use ui.canStayInEditMode to obtain a boolean indicating whether the cell is allowed to stay in edit mode. Use ui.cell to obtain the cell for which the control is in edit mode. Use ui.validationRule to obtain the rule which failed validation. The EditModeValidationError is raised while exiting edit mode if the new value for the activeCell is not valid based on the criteria of that cell's ig.excel.DataValidationRule. Since the rule needs to evaluate the value of the cell and potentially other cell's in the Worksheet, the value is first applied to the cell(s) and then is validated. By default if the event is not handled and the showErrorMessageForInvalidValue is true, a message box will be displayed to the end user to determine what action to take. One can handle this event and specify the action that should be taken using the action. Note: The validation rule will not be evaluated if edit mode is being cancelled such as when the user presses Escape to cancel edit. Note: The action will default to AcceptChange if the ShowErrorMessageForInvalidValue of the validationRule is false; otherwise it will default to ShowPrompt. Note: Like Microsoft Excel, only the validation rule of the active cell is considered even if the update is affecting other cells in the selection.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.EditRangePasswordNeeded
member.summary: Event which is raised when the Spreadsheet is performing an operation on a protected Worksheet and there is a single range that may be unlocked to allow the operation to be performed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.ranges to obtain an array of protected range objects that should be unlocked. Use ui.unprotect to obtain a parameterless function that may be invoked to unlock the associated ranges.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.HyperlinkExecuting
member.summary: Event which is raised when the selection for a ig.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetPane of the Spreadsheet is changed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.hyperlink to obtain the hyperlink to be executed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Event which is raised when a hyperlink is being followed in the Spreadsheet. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.pane to obtain the pane for which the selection has changed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.UserPromptDisplaying
member.summary: Event which is raised when the user will be prompted with a message regarding an operation that is being performed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet. Use ui.canCancel to obtain a boolean indicating if the operation that triggered the prompt can be cancelled. Use ui.displayMessage to obtain a boolean indicating if a message will be displayed to the end user. Use ui.exception to obtain the exception for the error, if there was one. Use ui.message to obtain or set the message that will be displayed. Use ui.trigger to obtain the action that caused the prompt to be displayed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetClientEvents.WorkbookDirtied
member.summary: Event which is raised when a change has been made to the workbook that might require a save. Note: This event is invoked asynchronously with regards to the change(s) that have occurred. Also some changes alone are not considered to dirty the Workbook even though it does change state on the Workbook or one of its subobjects. An example of that would be a zoom type operation (e.g. changing the magnificationInNormalView). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSpreadsheet.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetSelectionMode
member.summary: Specifies the selection is updated when interacting with the cells via the mouse or keyboard.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetSelectionMode.Normal
member.summary: The selection is replaced when dragging the mouse to select a cell or range of cells. Similarly when navigating via the keyboard a new selection is created. One may add a new range by holding the Ctrl key and using the mouse and one may alter the selection range containing the active cell by holding the Shift key down while clicking with the mouse or navigating with the keyboard such as with the arrow keys.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetSelectionMode.ExtendedSelection
member.summary: The selection range in the cellRanges representing the active cell is updated as one uses the mouse to select a cell or navigating via the keyboard.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetSelectionMode.AddToSelection
member.summary: New cell ranges are added to the cellRanges without needing to hold down the ctrl key when dragging via the mouse and a range is added with the first arrow key navigation after entering the mode. One can enter the mode by pressing Shift+F8.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetEnterKeyNavigationDirection
member.summary: Specifies direction of the cell adjacent to the activeCell that should be activated when the enter key is pressed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetEnterKeyNavigationDirection.Down
member.summary: The cell below should be activated.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetEnterKeyNavigationDirection.Right
member.summary: The cell to the right should be activated.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetEnterKeyNavigationDirection.Up
member.summary: The cell above should be activated.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetEnterKeyNavigationDirection.Left
member.summary: The cell to the left should be activated.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.ActiveCell
member.summary: Gets sets the A1 format address of the current active cell within the selected worksheet.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.IsScrollLocked
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating whether the scroll lock key is toggled. This property is used when certain keys are pressed while the control has focus. For example if an arrow key is pressed while the scroll lock is enabled the cell area will be scrolled rather than changing the active cell. Note: This property is not maintained/changed by the control. It is just queried when performing actions that consider whether the scroll lock is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.AllowAddWorksheet
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating whether the spreadsheet allows adding worksheets.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.AllowDeleteWorksheet
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating whether the spreadsheet allows deleting worksheets.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.AreGridlinesVisible
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating if the grid lines are displayed in the selected worksheets.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.AreHeadersVisible
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating if the row and column headers are displayed for the selected worksheets.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.EnterKeyNavigationDirection
member.summary: Returns or sets an enumeration indicating the direction of the cell adjacent to the activeCell that should be activated when the enter key is pressed. This property is only used if the isEnterKeyNavigationEnabled is set to true. Also, the reverse direction is navigated when Shift + Enter are pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.FixedDecimalPlaceCount
member.summary: Gets sets the number of decimal places by which a whole number typed in during edit mode should be adjusted when isFixedDecimalEnabled is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.IsEnterKeyNavigationEnabled
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating whether the adjacent cell indicated by the enterKeyNavigationDirection should be navigated to when the enter key is pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.IsFixedDecimalEnabled
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating if the formula bar is displayed within the Spreadsheet.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.IsFormulaBarVisible
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating if the formula bar is displayed within the Spreadsheet.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.IsInEndMode
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating whether the control is in "End mode". End mode is a mode that affects certain keyboard navigation such as navigating with the arrow keys. For example when in end mode and one presses the right arrow, the activeCell will be changed to be the first cell to the right of the current ActiveCell that has a value(even if the value is ""). If there were no cells to the right with a value then it would activate the right most cell in that row. End mode will end automatically such as when one presses an arrow key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.IsUndoEnabled
member.summary: Gets sets a boolean indicating whether undo is enabled for the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SpreadsheetModel.NameBoxWidth
member.summary: Gets sets the width of the name box within the formula bar.

member.summary: Gets sets a value indicating how the selection is updated when interacting with the cells via the mouse or keyboard.

member.summary: Returns or sets the position of the screen tip used to display the input message for the data validation rule associated with the active cell.

member.summary: Returns or sets the URL of the workbook whose information is displayed in the control.

member.summary: Describes the tree grid sorting feature

member.summary: default property name in GET request used to populate contextRowMode property

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.MODE_KEY
member.summary: default property name in GET request used to populate Mode property

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging._ancestors
member.summary: List of ancestors for the first record of the page

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging._childDataKey
member.summary: The child data key used in function getting ancestors

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.#ctor
member.summary: creates a new tree grid paging setting with default values

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.Mode
member.summary: When Mode is RootLevelOnly: Only pages records at the root of the tree grid are displayed. When mode is AllLevelsincludes all visible records in paging.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.ContextRowMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the context row mode.When data flows to the next page there are a couple of different modes that can help communicate the context of a leaf level row.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.ContextRowLoadingText
member.summary: Sets/gets the text message shown while loading content of the context row(while processing breadcrumb/immediate parent row). It is set via $.html(). If set to null loading message is not shown.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.ContextRowRootText
member.summary: Sets/gets the content of the context row when the first record in the page is root(hasn't ancestors) record. It is set via $.html()

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.BreadcrumbKey
member.summary: Sets/gets the column key of ancestor to be shown in the breadcrumb trail. It is used only when contextRowMode is breadcrumb

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.BreadcrumbDelimiter
member.summary: Sets/gets (it is set via $.html()) delimiter between ancestors in the breadcrumb trail. It is used only when contextRowMode is breadcrumb

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.RenderContextRowFunc
member.summary: Reference to the function, called before rendering context row content(rendering loading message/bread crumb/parent row). The function takes 3 arguments- dataRow, array of parent rows and context mode - "loading"|"breadcrumb"|"parent". When the function returns true rendering of the context row should be handled by the developer(it is like canceling of rendering context row content).

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.GetAncestors(System.Object,Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel)
member.summary: Gets the ancestors for the specified record. For the grid model it should have processed data and properties flatData and FlatVisibleData should be populated
member.param: Finds ancestors for the specifies record.
The tree grid model(property Data Level should be populated and the data should be processed - dataLevel for each record should be set).

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridPaging.TransformDataSource(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGridModel,System.Linq.IQueryable@)
member.summary: applies Skip, Take and Count on the IQueryable. It overrides TransformDataSource of the base GridPaging. If Type is remote and Mode AllLevels then it is applied paging based on the visible records(taking into account expanded/collapsed records). Otherwise it is used base GridPaging - TransformDataSource.

member.summary: Add information about breadcrumb

member.summary: Add information about breadcrumb

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridRowSelectors.CheckBoxMode

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGridModel.Indentation

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGridModel.ShowExpansionIndicator

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGridModel.RenderExpansionIndicatorColumn
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to render the expansion indicator in its own column. Default is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGridModel.ForeignKeyRootValue
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to render the expansion indicated in its own column. Default is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGridModel.RenderFirstDataCellFunction
member.summary: a reference or name of a javascript function which changes first data cell - renders indentation according to databound level

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGridModel.RenderExpansionCellFunction
member.summary: Reference or name of a JavaScript function responsible for rendering the expansion indicator. This function is called ONLY if renderExpansionIndicatorColumn is set to true.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Tree Grid Framework (igTreeGrid widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowExpanding
member.summary: Event which is fired when a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is about to be expanded. Return false in order to cancel row expanding. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that should be expanded(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent)fixed row element that is about to expanded(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataLevel to access the databound level of the topmost treegrid row to be expanded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowExpanded
member.summary: Event which is fired after a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is expanded. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that was expanded(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent)fixed row element that was expanded(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound level of the topmost treegrid row that was expanded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowCollapsing
member.summary: Event which is fired when a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is about to be collapsed. Return false in order to cancel row collapsing. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that should be collapsed(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent fixed)row element that is going to be collapsed(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound level of the topmost treegrid row to be collapsed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowCollapsed
member.summary: Event which is fired after a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is collapsed. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that was collapsed(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent fixed)row element that was collapsed(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the topmost treegrid row that was collapsed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowExpanding
member.summary: Event which is fired when a child treegrid row is about to be shown. Return false in order to cancel child row expanding. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that should be shown(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that should be shown(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowExpanded
member.summary: Event which is fired after a child treegrid row is shown. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that is shown(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that is shown(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowCollapsing
member.summary: Event which is fired when a child treegrid row is about to be hidden. Return false in order to cancel child row collapsing. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that should be hidden(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that should be hidden(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowCollapsed
member.summary: Event which is fired after a child treegrid row is hidden. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that is hidden(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that is hidden(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFeatureFactory
member.summary: The TreeGrid factory class is used to create specific(for the TreeGrid) feature instances. It is used for creating TreeGrid feature instances - like TreeGridPaging, TreeGridFiltering, etc.(mainly used in TreeGridDataSourceActionAttribute) (Example: For TreeGrid - it instantiates TreeGridFiltering, TreeGridPaging, etc.)

member.summary: Creates instance of TreeGridFeature(e.g. if feature name is paging creates TreeGridPaging, filtering - TreeGridFiltering, etc.)

member.summary: Specifies the indentation (in pixels or percent) for a tree grid row. Nested indentation is achieved by calculating the level times the indentation value. Ex: '10px' or '5%'. Default is 30.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.InitialIndentationLevel
member.summary: if initial indentation level is set then it is used to be calculated width of the data skip column(usually used when remote load on demand is enabled)

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.ShowExpansionIndicator
member.summary: Specifies if rows(that have child rows) will have an expander image that will allow end users to expand and collapse them. This option can be set only at initialization.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.ForeignKeyRootValue
member.summary: Specifies which item in the data source to treat as root row by its primaryKey value. Defaults to -1 (which includes the entire data source)

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.ForeignKey
member.summary: defines the property in the child layout which holds the non-unique id that links the child layout to the parent. in cases of one to many relationships a foreign key will most probably *not* match the primary key of the child layout, so it will need to be defined. in one to one relationships the ForeignKey may be the same as the PrimaryKey. Note that when binding to flat data, the ChildDataKey option also needs to be set to an existing object that's of type ICollection (or a type that implements ICollection).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.RenderExpansionIndicatorColumn
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to render the expansion indicated in its own column. Default is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.RenderFirstDataCellFunction
member.summary: a reference or name of a javascript function which changes first data cell - renders indentation according to databound level

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.RenderExpansionCellFunction
member.summary: Reference or name of a JavaScript function responsible for rendering the expansion indicator. This function is called ONLY if renderExpansionIndicatorColumn is set to true.

member.summary: Specifies to the tree grid if data is loaded on demand from a remote server. Default is false.

member.summary: Set expansion state for the specified data record

member.summary: Get list of expansion states from query string. The URL format of expanded records is expansionUrlKey[primaryKeyValue]=true/false OR expansionUrlKey(primaryKeyValue)=true/false

member.summary: First performs data binding and after that gets the part of processed data that is specified by path

member.summary: Transform flat to hierarchical data(it should be set PrimaryKey, ForeignKey). Grid model should have property property name defined in "ChildDataKey".

member.summary: Processes the data source recursively as generating flatData and flatVisibleData, also setting metadata as dataLevel, expansion state, etc

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.ProcessDataSourceRecursively(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Object,System.Boolean},System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Processes the data source recursively for data layout. Generates flatData and flatVisibleData, also setting metadata as dataLevel, expansion state, etc

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.GetChildData(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the child data for the specified path. Used when remoteLoadOnDemand is true. (Example: If the treegrid has column ID set as primary key(and its type is integer) then if path is 1/10 - then it founds record with pk value 1 from root layout - takes its children and finds amongst them record with primary key value 10 - returns its children)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.GetDataLevelFromPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the data level from path(used when EnableRemoteLoadOnDemand is true).

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.ProcessDataToJsonResult(System.Linq.IQueryable)
member.summary: Processes the data to JSON result - - as adding metadata for each record

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.ProcessDataToJsonResultRecursively(System.Linq.IQueryable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Processes the data to json result recursively - as traversing the whole queryable. When remoteLoadOnDemand is TRUE processes only records for the current layout - except of the cases when records are expanded(example - when filtering is applied and child records are in result set OR initialExpandDepth is set)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.AddMetadataForRecord(System.Object,System.String,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Adds the metadata for record.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridModel.GetMetadataForRecord(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for record.

member.summary: TreeGrid definition containing methods that can be chained. Implementation of the Fluent design pattern which allows the control to be configured directly in the view

member.summary: locale settings

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.Features(System.Action{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFeatureBuilder{`0}})
member.summary: a list of grid features (Paging, Sorting, Filtering, etc.)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.Columns(System.Action{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnBuilder{`0}})
member.summary: allows for using lambda expressions in the view

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.ChildDataKey(System.String)
member.summary: Property name of the array of child data in a hierarchical data source.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.Indentation(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the indentation (in pixels or percent) for a tree grid row. Nested indentation is achieved by calculating the level times the indentation value. Ex: '10px' or '5%'. Default is 30.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.InitialIndentationLevel(System.Int32)
member.summary: if initial indentation level is set then it is used to be calculated width of the data skip column(usually used when remote load on demand is enabled)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.ShowExpansionIndicator(System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Specifies if rows(that have child rows) will have an expander image that will allow end users to expand and collapse them. This option can be set only at initialization.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.RenderExpansionIndicatorColumn(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to render the expansion indicated in its own column. Default is true.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.RenderFirstDataCellFunction(System.String)
member.summary: a reference or name of a javascript function which changes first data cell - renders indentation according to databound level

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.RenderExpansionCellFunction(System.String)
member.summary: Reference or name of a JavaScript function responsible for rendering the expansion indicator. This function is called ONLY if renderExpansionIndicatorColumn is set to true.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.ForeignKeyRootValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Unique identifier used in a self-referencing flat data source. Used with key to create a relationship among flat data sources.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.ForeignKey(System.String)
member.summary: defines the property in the child layout which holds the non-unique id that links the child layout to the parent. in cases of one to many relationships a foreign key will most probably *not* match the primary key of the child layout, so it will need to be defined. in one to one relationships the ForeignKey may be the same as the PrimaryKey. Note that when binding to flat data, the ChildDataKey option also needs to be set to an existing object that's of type ICollection (or a type that implements ICollection).

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridWrapper`1.DataSourceSettings(System.Action{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridDataSourceSettingsBuilder{`0}})
member.summary: Specifiec TreeGridDataSource settings

member.summary: renders the tree grid on the Mvc View

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents
member.summary: Client events exposed by the igTree widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary: Event fired prior to databinding. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree performing databinding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary: Event fired after databinding is complete but rendering has not yet started. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree performing databinding. Use ui.dataView to get a reference to the data the tree has been databound to.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.Rendering
member.summary: Event fired prior to starting the rendering of the widget, item descriptions should be present at this point if they are not provided by the user but are generated internally. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree performing rendering. Use ui.dataView to get a reference to the data the tree is going to render.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.Rendered
member.summary: Event fired after the widget has built and attach all the DOM it is rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.SelectionChanging
member.summary: Event fired prior to changing the selected node in the tree. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.selectedNodes to get a reference to currently selected nodes. Use ui.newNodes to get a reference to the new nodes getting selected.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Event fired after changing the selected node in the tree has finished. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.selectedNodes to get a reference to the selected nodes. Use ui.newNodes to get a reference to the newly added nodes to the selection.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeCheckstateChanging
member.summary: Fired prior to changing the checkbox state of a node Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the node object the checkbox of which is being interacted with. Use ui.currentState to get the current state of the checkbox. Use ui.newState to get the new future state of the checkbox. Use ui.currentCheckedNodes to get the collection of all checked nodes before the new state is applied.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeCheckstateChanged
member.summary: Fired after the checkbox state of a node has changed Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the node object the checkbox of which is being interacted with. Use ui.newState to get the new current state of the checkbox. Use ui.newCheckedNodes to get the collection of all checked nodes. Use ui.newPartiallyCheckedNodes to get the collection of all partially checked nodes.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodePopulating
member.summary: Fired prior to the children of a node being populated in the case of load on demand Use ui.path to get a reference to the path of the node being populated. Use ui.element to get a reference to the jQuery element of the node being populated. Use ui.data to get the node data. Use ui.binding to get a reference to the bindings object for the level at which the populating node is located.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodePopulated
member.summary: Fired after the children of a node are populated in the case of load on demand Use ui.path to get a reference to the path of the populated node. Use ui.element to get a reference to the jQuery element of the populated node. Use ui.data to get the node data. Use ui.binding to get a reference to the bindings object for the level at which the populated node is located.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeCollapsing
member.summary: Fired prior to a node being collapsed Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the node object about to collapse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeCollapsed
member.summary: Fired after a node is collapsed Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the collapsed node object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeExpanding
member.summary: Fired prior to a node being expanded Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the node object about to expand.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeExpanded
member.summary: Fired after a node is expanded Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the expanded node object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeClick
member.summary: Fired on node click. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the tree. Use ui.node to get a reference to the node object being clicked.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeDoubleClick
member.summary: Fired on node double click Use ui.path to get a reference to the path of the double clicked node. Use ui.element to get a reference to the jQuery element of the double clicked node. Use ui.data to get the node data. Use ui.binding to get a reference to the bindings object for the level at which the double clicked node is located.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.DragStart
member.summary: Fired on node drag start Use ui.binding to gets a reference to the binding. Use ui.data to get a reference to the data. Use ui.element to get a reference to the element. Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper. Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset. Use ui.orginalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element (the node). Use ui.path to get a reference to the node path. Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.Drag
member.summary: Fired on node drag Use ui.binding to gets a reference to the binding. Use ui.data to get a reference to the data. Use ui.element to get a reference to the element. Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper. Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset. Use ui.orginalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element (the node). Use ui.path to get a reference to the node path. Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.DragStop
member.summary: Fired after a drag operation has completed Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper. Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset. Use ui.orginalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element (the node). Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeDropping
member.summary: Fired before a node drop Use ui.binding to gets a reference to the binding. Use ui.data to get a reference to the data. Use ui.draggable to get a reference to the draggable element (the node). Use ui.element to get a reference to the element. Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper. Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset. Use ui.path to get a reference to the node path. Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeClientEvents.NodeDropped
member.summary: Fired after a node drop Use ui.binding to gets a reference to the binding. Use ui.data to get a reference to the data. Use ui.draggable to get a reference to the draggable element (the node). Use ui.element to get a reference to the element. Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper. Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset. Use ui.path to get a reference to the node path. Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.
