member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by File Upload (igUpload widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileSelecting
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload selecting event. Fired when browse button is pressed. Return false in order to cancel selecting file. Function takes argument evt.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileSelected
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload selected event. Fired when file is selected from browse dialog. Return false in order to cancel uploading file. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileUploading
member.summary: Defines the name of the file uploading event. Fired every time when fileuploader get status for the upload. Return false in order to cancel uploading file. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file. Use ui.uploadedBytes to get uploaded bytes. Use ui.fileStatus to get current file status. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileUploaded
member.summary: Defines the name of the uploaded event. Fired when the file is uploaded. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileUploadAborted
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload cancel event. Fired when the server responses that the file is canceled. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file. Use ui.uploadedBytes to get uploaded bytes. Use ui.fileStatus to get current file status. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.CancelAllClicked
member.summary: Defines the name of the cancel all button event click. Fired when cancel all button in summary is clicked. Fired only in multiple upload mode. Function takes argument evt and ui. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.OnError
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload error event. Fired when error is occurred. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.errorCode to get current errorCode. Use ui.errorMessage to get detailed error description. Use ui.errorType to get error type - it could be clientside or serverside. Use ui.serverMessage to get specific server message returned by server - if errorType is serverside. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileExtensionsValidating
member.summary: It is fired when validating file extensions. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileName to get the full file name. Use ui.fileExtension to get file extension. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.OnXHRLoad
member.summary: It is fired when event onload(of XmlHttpRequest) is fired. This event will be fired only if the browser supports HTML5 file API. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.xhr to get reference to the original XMLHttpRequest object. Use ui.fileInfo to get reference to the fileInfo object - containing information for fileName, fileSize, serverMessage(if returned from the server-side), etc. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.OnFormDataSubmit
member.summary: It is fired before submitting to the server the uploading file(and its additional data if any). It could be used to append additional data fields to the FormData object(if the browser supports HTML5 file API - like newest Chrome, Firefox, IE11+). If the browser does not support HTML5 file API(IE10 and older) it could be added these data fields(as hidden input fields) to the form. Use the public API function addDataFields. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.fileInfo to get reference to the fileInfo object - containing information for the fileName, fileSize, serverMessage, etc. Use ui.xhr to get reference to the original XMLHttpRequest object(if the browser supports HTML 5 file API - if not it is undefined). Use ui.formData to get reference to FormData object(if the browser supports HTML5 file API) OR reference to jQuery representation of FORM. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Validator (igValidator widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.Validating
member.summary:
Event which is raised on validation before default validation logic is applied. Return false in order to cancel the event and consider the field valid. Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget. Use ui.value to get current value in target. Use ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.Validated
member.summary:
Event which is raised after value was validated but before any action takes effect. Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.valid to get state.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.Error
member.summary:
Event raised for invalid field after value was validated but before any action takes effect. Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.valid to get state.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.Success
member.summary:
Event raised for valid field after value was validated but before any action takes effect. Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.valid to get state.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorShowing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before error message is displayed.
Return false in order to prevent error message display.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorHiding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before error message is hidden.
Return false in order to keep error message displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorShown
member.summary:
Event which is raised after error message was displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorHidden
member.summary:
Event which is raised after error message was hidden.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.SuccessShowing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before success message is displayed.
Return false in order to prevent success message display.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.SuccessHiding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before success message is hidden.
Return false in order to keep success message displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.SuccessShown
member.summary:
Event which is raised after success message was displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.SuccessHidden
member.summary:
Event which is raised after success message was hidden.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.FormValidating
member.summary: Event triggered on Validator instance level before handling a form submit event. Return false to cancel to skip validating and potentially allow the submit if no other other validators return erros. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget. Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form. */

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.FormValidated
member.summary: Event triggered on Validator instance level as it is about to handle a form submit event Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget. Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form. */

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.FormError
member.summary: Event triggered on Validator instance level as it is about to handle a form submit event Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget. Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form. */

member.summary: Event triggered on Validator instance level as it is about to handle a form submit event Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget. Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form. */

member.summary: Class describing the options available for the Validator when cofigured through another widget.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorValidatorOptions.RequiredIndication
member.summary:
Options to show an asterisks indication next to required fields.
Note: Indicators are not supported on grouped controls such as checkbox or radio button sets and the igRating control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorValidatorOptions.OptionalIndication
member.summary: Options to show an optinal label indication next to optional fields. Note: Indicators are not supported on grouped controls such as checkbox or radio button sets and the igRating control.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase
member.summary: Base options available for the Validator when cofigured through another widget.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Threshold
member.summary:
Gets or sets validation minimum input length. Validation won't be triggered for input before that value is reached on change and blur.
Note: This will have no effect on required fields on form submit.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.ValueRange
member.summary: Sets the minimum and maximum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.LengthRange
member.summary: Gets or sets minimum and maximum length of text or number of selected items. Null or 0 values are ignored.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in the target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Required
member.summary: Requires the value in this field to be the same as another input element or editor control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.EqualTo
member.summary: Sets validation for not empty value in target control. Default value is false and validation is disabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Custom
member.summary:
Gets or sets a custom function to perform validation.
Use "this" to reference the calling validator and the value and optional field settings arguement to determine and return the state of the field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Sets the custom error message.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.SuccessMessage
member.summary: Sets text for success message.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Pattern
member.summary: Sets the javascript regular expression which method "test()" will be used for validation of value in control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Date
member.summary:
Gets or sets option to validate if value is a date. This can help guide the valueRange validation.
Note: Dependat on JavaScript Date parsing which will accept a wide range of values.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets option to validate if value is an email.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.Number
member.summary:
Gets or sets option to validate if value is a date. This can help guide the valueRange validation.
Note: Dependent on JavaScript Date parsing which will accept a wide range of values.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.CreditCard
member.summary:
Gets or sets option to validate if value is a Credit Card number.
Note: This rule will only validate the checksum of the number using Luhn algorithm irregardless of type.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.MessageTarget
member.summary: Gets or sets custom jQuery element, which innerHTML will be used to show validation messages. That can be SPAN, LABEL or DIV.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.ExecuteAllRules
member.summary: Gets/Sets if all rules for a field should be checked, so even if one fails the rest will continue executing. Note: This will not force checks on an empty field for rules that don't normally execute without a value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.OnBlur
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when control loses focus.

remarks.p: True: validate onblur event of browser, false: do not validate on blur. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.OnChange
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when value in control changes.

remarks.p: True: validate onchange, onkeydown, etc. events of browser, false: do not validate on change. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.OnSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the onsubmit event is raised on client.

remarks.p: True: validate onsubmit event of browser, false: do not validate onsubmit. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorOptionsBase.NotificationOptions
member.summary: Options for the igNotifier used to show error messages.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Video Player (igVideoPlayer widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Ended
member.summary:
Occurs when video has ended.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Playing
member.summary:
Occurs when video gets playing.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Paused
member.summary:
Occurs when video is paused.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Buffering
member.summary:
Occurs when a chunk of data is buffered.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.buffered to get buffered percentage.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Progress
member.summary:
Occurs when video has advanced the playback position.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.currentTime to get current position in the video at which the event was fired.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Waiting
member.summary:
Occurs when igVideoPlayer is waiting for data from the server.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.currentTime to get current position in the video at which the event was fired.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.BookmarkHit
member.summary:
Occurs when the bookmark is hit.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.bookmark to get the bookmark object from the bookmarks array.
Use ui.bookmarkElement to get the html element in the DOM.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.BookmarkClick
member.summary:
Occurs when the bookmark is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.bookmark to get the bookmark object from the bookmarks array.
Use ui.bookmarkElement to get the html element in the DOM.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.EnterFullScreen
member.summary:
Occurs when igVideoPlayer enters full screen mode.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.ExitFullScreen
member.summary:
Occurs when igVideoPlayer exits full screen mode.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.RelatedVideoClick
member.summary:
Occurs when related video is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.relatedVideo to get the relatedVideo object from the relatedVideos array.
Use ui.relatedVideoElement to get the relatedVideo html element in the DOM.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.BannerVisible
member.summary:
Defines the name of the player banner visible event. Fired when the banner has been displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.index to get the banner index in the banners array.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by igZoombar widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.ZoomChanging
member.summary: Event fired before a zoom action is applied. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.previousZoom.left to get the previous zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.previousZoom.width to get the previous zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.left to get the new zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.width to get the new zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.ZoomChanged
member.summary: Event fired after a zoom action is applied. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.previousZoom.left to get the previous zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.previousZoom.width to get the previous zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.left to get the new zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.width to get the new zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragStarting
member.summary: Event fired when the user attempts to drag the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragStarted
member.summary: Event fired when the user starts dragging the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragging
member.summary: Event fired when the user drags the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragEnding
member.summary: Event fired when the user attemtps to stop dragging the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragEnded
member.summary: Event fired when the user stops dragging the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowResizing
member.summary: Event fired when the user resizes the zoom window with the window's handles. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowResized
member.summary: Event fired after the user resizes the zoom window with the window's handles. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.Cube
member.summary: The Cube class represents an OLAP cube that holds a multi dimensional representation of a flat data set. A cube is analogous to a table in a relational database. Where a table in a relational database has two dimensions, a cube can have any number of dimensions. In its simplest form, the dimensions of a cube correspond to a field of the flat data set.

member.summary: Represents the dimension type of a

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Unknown
member.summary: Describes a dimension with an unknown or unspecified type.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Time
member.summary: Indicates that a dimension refers to time (for example, year, month, week, day).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Measure
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains measures.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Other
member.summary: Describes a dimension of the default dimension type, which is used for dimensions that are not time dimensions or measure dimensions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Quantitative
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains quantitative elements (for example, income level, or number of children).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Accounts
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains an accounts structure with parent-child relationships.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Customers
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains customer information. The lowest level represents individual customers.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Products
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains product information. The lowest level represents individual products.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Scenario
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains different business scenarios.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Utility
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains only calculated members. This type of dimension is usually used for data visualization techniques.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Currency
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains currency information.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Rates
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains different types of rates (for example, buy, sell, or discounted).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Channel
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains information about a distribution channel.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Promotion
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains information about marketing and advertising promotions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Organization
member.summary: Describes a dimension that represents the reporting structure of an organization.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.BillOfMaterials
member.summary: Describes a dimension that represents a material/component breakdown. The parent-child relationship implies a parent composed of its children.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.DimensionType.Geography
member.summary: Describes a dimension that contains a geographic hierarchy.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.LevelType
member.summary: Represents type of the level

member.summary: Indicates that a level exists within an account dimension.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.Core.Data.LevelType.All
member.summary: Indicates the top (All) level of a dimension (the one that precalculates all the members of all lower levels).
